text:
‚ÄúThe whole organization has made it really easy, to be honest,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúFamily-environment, the way the guys have accepted me, showing me different things, coaches, trainers, everybody, top to bottom and this is a top tier organization. So it makes it really easy for me to be honest, the basketball part.‚Äù
‚ÄúHe pulled me aside while the game was going on and said, ‚ÄòYou‚Äôre not having fun. Have fun,‚Äô‚Äù revealed the Kentucky product, ‚ÄúI have never really had a coach do that. He told me that. Then I started skipping.‚Äù Set to become a restricted free agent this summer, Quickley has been impressed by the Raptors.
